0x5dd88b3aa3143173eb26552923922bdf33f509.name: Steakhouse/Coinshift Boosted
0x5dd88b3aa3143173eb26552923922bdf33f509.description: This boosted pool's underlying mechanics are powered by wrapped Steakhouse and Coinshift tokens, which generate yield from lending activities on Morpho.

0x10a04efba5b880e169920fd4348527c64fb29d.name: Coinshift USDC/USDL
0x10a04efba5b880e169920fd4348527c64fb29d.description: This boosted pool is powered by Coinshift's yield bearing stablecoins, csUSDC and csUSDL, built with Morpho, Paxos and Steakhouse.
